item.title: Create a Hugo site with Github
item.description: Step 1: Install Hugo For Linux users, you can install hugo through snap or apt-get command in the terminal. See install for further details or if you are running other OS. snap install hugo or sudo apt-get install hugo Step 2: Create a new site In your terminal, run the following command, where site_name will be your site directory. This means that all the markdown and templates and configuration will be store in that directory.
